verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-da-Vidof David מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm קַוֹּ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> kav-Voh I waited קִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6960><s%> kiv-Vi-ti patiently יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; for the LORD וַיֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet and he inclined אֵ֝לַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' unto me and heard שַׁוְעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7775><s%> shav-'a-Ti. my cry

וַיַּעֲלֵ֤נִי׀ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Le-ni He brought me up מִבּ֥וֹר <S%H953><s%> mib-Bor pit שָׁאוֹן֮ <S%H7588><s%> sha-'On also out of an horrible מִטִּ֪יט <S%H2916><s%> mit-Tit clay הַיָּ֫וֵ֥ן <S%H3121><s%> hai-Ya-Ven out of the miry וַיָּ֖קֶם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kem and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon סֶ֥לַע <S%H5553><s%> Se-la' upon a rock רַגְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lai, my feet כּוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> ko-Nen [and] established אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <S%H838><s%> 'a-shu-Rai. my goings

וַיִּתֵּ֬ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten And he hath put בְּפִ֨י׀ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi in my mouth שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir song חָדָשׁ֮ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash a new תְּהִלָּ֪ה <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah [even] praise לֵֽאלֹ֫הֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> le-Lo-Hei-nu unto our God יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U shall see רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim many וְיִירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-Ra-'u; [it] and fear וְ֝יִבְטְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> ve-yiv-te-Chu, and shall trust בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. in the LORD

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> hag-Ge-ver, [is] that man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam that maketh יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִבְטַח֑וֹ <S%H4009><s%> miv-ta-Cho; his trust וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not פָנָ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> fa-Nah and respecteth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רְ֝הָבִ֗ים <S%H7295><s%> re-ha-Vim, not the proud וְשָׂטֵ֥י <S%H7750><s%> ve-sa-Tei nor such as turn aside כָזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav. to lies

רַבּ֤וֹת <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bot Many עָשִׂ֨יתָ׀ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta works [which] thou hast done אַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהַי֮ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai my God נִֽפְלְאֹתֶ֥יךָ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha [are] thy wonderful וּמַחְשְׁבֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4284><s%> u-mach-she-vo-Tei-cha, and thy thoughts אֵ֫לֵ֥ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu toward אֵ֤ין׀ <S%H369><s%> 'ein There עֲרֹ֬ךְ <S%H6186><s%> 'a-Roch [which are] to us-ward they cannot be reckoned up in order אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, toward אַגִּ֥ידָה <S%H5046><s%> 'ag-Gi-dah unto thee [if] I would declare וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <S%H1696><s%> va-'a-dab-Be-rah; and speak עָ֝צְמ֗וּ <S%H6105><s%> 'a-tze-Mu, [of them] they are more מִסַּפֵּֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> mis-sap-Per. than can be numbered

זֶ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach Sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֨ה׀ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah and offering לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not חָפַ֗צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fatz-ta, thou didst not desire אָ֭זְנַיִם <S%H241><s%> 'A-ze-na-yim mine ears כָּרִ֣יתָ <S%H3738><s%> ka-Ri-ta hast thou opened לִּ֑י Li; עוֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> o-Lah burnt offering וַ֝חֲטָאָ֗ה <S%H2401><s%> va-cha-ta-'Ah, and sin offering לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not שָׁאָֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'A-le-ta. hast thou not required

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'A-mar-ti Then said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold בָ֑אתִי <S%H935><s%> Va-ti; I Lo I come בִּמְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> bim-gil-lat- in the volume סֵ֝֗פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer, of the book כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv [it is] written עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. unto

לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת־ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sot- to do רְצוֹנְךָ֣ <S%H7522><s%> re-tzon-Cha thy will אֱלֹהַ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai O my God חָפָ֑צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fa-tze-ti; I delight וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ <S%H8451><s%> ve-To-ra-te-cha, yea thy law בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [is] within מֵעָֽי׃ <S%H4578><s%> me-'Ai. my heart

בִּשַּׂ֤רְתִּי <S%H1319><s%> bis-Sar-ti I have preached צֶ֨דֶק׀ <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek righteousness בְּקָ֘הָ֤ל <S%H6951><s%> be-Ka-Hal congregation רָ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, in the great הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שְׂ֭פָתַי <S%H8193><s%> fa-tai my lips לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶכְלָ֑א <S%H3607><s%> 'ech-La; lo I have not refrained יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-ta. thou knowest

צִדְקָתְךָ֬ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ka-te-Cha thy righteousness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not כִסִּ֨יתִי׀ <S%H3680><s%> chis-Si-ti I have not hid בְּת֬וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch within לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, my heart אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-na-te-Cha thy faithfulness וּתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ <S%H8668><s%> u-te-shu-'a-te-Cha and thy salvation אָמָ֑רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Ma-re-ti; I have declared לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not כִחַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3582><s%> chi-Chad-ti I have not concealed חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> va-'a-mit-te-cha, and thy truth לְקָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> le-ka-Hal congregation רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> Rav. from the great

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from me O LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not תִכְלָ֣א <S%H3607><s%> tich-La Withhold רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mei-cha not thou thy tender mercies מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha let thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> va-'a-mit-te-cha, and thy truth תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid continually יִצְּרֽוּנִי׃ <S%H5341><s%> yitz-tze-Ru-ni. preserve

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָפְפ֥וּ־ <S%H661><s%> 'a-fe-Fu- have compassed עָלַ֨י׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and רָע֡וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot evils עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against אֵ֬ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else מִסְפָּ֗ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par, For innumerable הִשִּׂיג֣וּנִי <S%H5381><s%> his-si-Gu-ni have taken hold עֲ֭וֹנֹתַי <S%H5771><s%> 'A-vo-no-tai me about mine iniquities וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- I am not יָכֹ֣לְתִּי <S%H3201><s%> ya-Cho-le-ti upon me so that I am not able לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot; to look up עָצְמ֥וּ <S%H6105><s%> 'a-tze-Mu they are more מִשַּֽׂעֲר֥וֹת <S%H8185><s%> mis-sa-'a-Rot than the hairs רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi, of mine head וְלִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi therefore my heart עֲזָבָֽנִי׃ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-za-Va-ni. faileth

רְצֵ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> re-Tzeh Be pleased יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> le-hatz-tzi-Le-ni; to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> le-'ez-Ra-ti to help חֽוּשָׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> Chu-shah. make haste

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ׀ <S%H2659><s%> ve-yach-pe-Ru and confounded יַחַד֮ <S%H3162><s%> ya-Chad together מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei that seek נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, after my soul לִסְפּ֫וֹתָ֥הּ <S%H5595><s%> lis-Po-Tah to destroy יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> yis-So-gu it let them be driven אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> 'A-chor backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <S%H3637><s%> ve-yik-kal-Mu; and put to shame חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <S%H2655><s%> cha-fe-Tzei, that wish רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Ti. me evil

יָ֭שֹׁמּוּ <S%H8074><s%> Ya-shom-mu Let them be desolate עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> 'E-kev for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H1322><s%> ba-she-Tam; of their shame הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-me-Rim that say לִ֝֗י Li, הֶאָ֥ח׀ <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach unto me Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach. aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> ya-Si-su thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ׀ <S%H8055><s%> ve-yis-me-Chu and be glad בְּךָ֗ be-Cha, כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H1245><s%> me-Vak-Shei-cha Let all those that seek יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> Ta-mid continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> yig-Dal be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD אֹֽ֝הֲבֵ֗י <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vei, in thee let such as love תְּשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'a-Te-cha. thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I am עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-yOn and needy אֲדֹנָ֪י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai [yet] the Lord יַחֲשָׁ֫ב <S%H2803><s%> ya-cha-Shav thinketh לִ֥י li עֶזְרָתִ֣י <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-ra-Ti upon me thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <S%H6403><s%> u-me-fal-Ti and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; O אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, O my God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <S%H309><s%> te-'a-Char. make no tarrying
